professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in IT infrastructure, database management, system administration, and data integration. Skilled in SQL Server, Oracle, Active Directory, and system-wide optimization.

key_responsibilities: Developed and maintained database objects such as procedures
Optimized T-SQL queries and used SQL Profiler to improve query efficiency.
Designed and developed databases for various applications.
Implemented data integration and migration strategies.
Performed performance tuning and monitoring of T-SQL queries.
Provided first-level support for Active Directory users and applications.
Managed network infrastructure and client setup.
Performed daily backups and system maintenance.
Monitored and optimized SQL Server performance.
Managed schema objects and database integrity.
Performed regular maintenance tasks like index optimization and deadlock prevention.
